Spokane.First Congregational Church of Spokane:
First Congregational Church of Spokane (also known as Westminster Congregational Church of Spokane) is a historic church building at West 311–329 4th Avenue in Spokane, Washington.
It was built in 1890 in a Romanesque Revival/Richardsonian Romanesque style and added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1978.
